channel.title: Teleport after Killing something
channel.description: This is my first time posting so i hope this is in the right section. I am just wondering if there is a way when you make a minigame that you teleport after you kill the last monster, BUT with an item or reward. I know you can teleport after you kill something so don't tell me how to do that. Is there a way you can get an item when you teleport though? Thanks Please reply.
